Caption: Dr. P. Subbaroyan (Minister for Transport and Communication) gives a prize to Mr. Sudhir Puri (possibly)
Description: The Chief Guest, Dr. P. Subbarayan (Union Minister of Transport and Communication) distributed a number of prizes to students, faculty members and others involved with the Institution at the Third Institute Day. The Institute Day of IIT Madras is a day marked to celebrate the hard work and success of certain people who have shown excellence in academics as well as extracurricular activities. In the image, Dr. P. Subbarayan (Union Minister of Transport and Communication) gives away prize to a student who has been identified as Mr. Sudhir Puri. Also seen in the background, wearing spectacles is Mr. Sampath Kumaran (Deputy Registrar). Identification by Mr. K. Narayanan, Mr. C. V. Sahasranamam and Mr. Anand Singh Bawa
